name: Lock n Loaded
description:
Lock n Load is a fast-paced action bullet hell game where you can zoom around in on a parkour environment while controlling time in slow motion to unleash the bullet hell.

A prototype made for the 2022 Experimental Game Design Jam 3 - "SpeedRunner- TimeShift- Luminescent ."
